text: Simon Ekpa (born 21 March, 1985) is a Nigerian-Finnish political activist and former athlete. He is one of Nnamdi Kanu's disciples who fights for the independence of Biafra from Nigeria. Ekpa is said to have caused trouble in the South-East, especially with his sit-at-home orders before the 2023 general election in Nigeria. Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian activists Category:Finnish politicians
title: Simon Ekpa
